data.lyric:
[ti:Guess I Just Feel Like]
[ar:John Mayer]
[al:Guess I Just Feel Like]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]I Guess I Just Feel Like - John Mayer (约翰·梅尔)
[00:03.83]Lyrics by：John Mayer
[00:07.67]Composed by：John Mayer
[00:11.51]I guess I just feel like
[00:17.53]I guess I just feel like
[00:23.50]Nobody's honest
[00:26.46]Nobody's true
[00:29.68]Everyone's lying
[00:32.49]To make it on through
[00:35.54]I guess I just feel like
[00:41.37]I'm the same way too
[00:59.50]I guess I just feel like
[01:05.43]Good things are gone
[01:11.05]And the weight of my worries
[01:17.07]Is too much to take on
[01:23.24]I think I remember
[01:26.29]This dream that I had
[01:29.28]This love's gonna save us
[01:32.25]From a world that's gone mad
[01:35.50]I guess I just feel like
[01:41.39]What happened to that
[02:23.50]I guess I just feel like
[02:29.33]The joke's getting old
[02:35.46]The future is fading
[02:41.10]And the past is on hold
[02:47.44]But I know that I'm open
[02:50.47]And I know that I'm free
[02:53.43]And I'll always let hope in
[02:56.43]Wherever I'll be
[02:59.66]And if I go blind I'll still find my way
[03:05.54]I guess I just felt like
[03:11.31]Giving up today
data.trans:
[ti:Guess I Just Feel Like]
[ar:John Mayer]
[al:Guess I Just Feel Like]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:03.83]//
[00:07.67]//
[00:11.51]我想我只是觉得
[00:17.53]我想我只是觉得
[00:23.50]无人诚实可靠
[00:26.46]无人真实可信
[00:29.68]每个人都谎话连篇
[00:32.49]只为了所谓的坚持到底
[00:35.54]我想我只是觉得
[00:41.37]我也是一样的人
[00:59.50]我想我只是觉得
[01:05.43]美好都已消逝不见
[01:11.05]还有我的烦恼担忧
[01:17.07]快要将我压垮
[01:23.24]我想我记得
[01:26.29]我曾拥有的梦
[01:29.28]这份爱会拯救我们
[01:32.25]逃离这疯狂世界
[01:35.50]我想我只是觉得
[01:41.39]发生的种种
[02:23.50]我想我只是觉得
[02:29.33]这玩笑已经老套
[02:35.46]未来渐渐消逝
[02:41.10]时间停滞曾经
[02:47.44]但我知道我会敞开心扉
[02:50.47]但我知道我会无拘无束
[02:53.43]我永远会让希望进驻心底
[02:56.43]无论我将去往何方
[02:59.66]即便我迷失方向 我也会努力寻找前路
[03:05.54]我想我只是觉得
[03:11.31]放弃今天
